verses.verse: These be the words <WH1697> which Mosheh <WH4872> spake <WH1696> <WH8765> unto all Yisra'EL <WH3478> on this side <WH5676> Yarden <WH3383> in the wilderness <WH4057>, in the plain <WH6160> over against <WH4136> the Red <WH5489> sea, between Paran <WH6290>, and Tophel <WH8603>, and Laban <WH3837>, and Hazeroth <WH2698>, and Dizahab <WH1774>.
( There are eleven <WH259> <WH6240> days <WH3117> ' journey from Horev <WH2722> by the way <WH1870> of mount <WH2022> Seir <WH8165> unto Kadeshbarnea <WH6947>.)

And it came to pass in the fortieth <WH705> year <WH8141>, in the eleventh <WH6249> <WH6240> month <WH2320>, on the first <WH259> day of the month <WH2320>, that Mosheh <WH4872> spake <WH1696> <WH8765> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, according unto all that the YY <WH3068> had given him in Mitzvah <WH6680> <WH8765> unto them;

After <WH310> he had slain <WH5221> <WH8687> Sichon <WH5511> the king <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567>, which dwelt <WH3427> <WH8802> in Heshbon <WH2809>, and Og <WH5747> the king <WH4428> of Bashan <WH1316>, which dwelt <WH3427> <WH8802> at Astaroth <WH6252> in Edrei <WH154>:
On this side <WH5676> Yarden <WH3383>, in the land <WH776> of Moab <WH4124>, began <WH2974> <WH8689> Mosheh <WH4872> to declare <WH874> <WH8763> this Torah <WH8451>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,
The YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430> spake <WH1696> <WH8765> unto us in Horev <WH2722>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Ye have dwelt <WH3427> <WH8800> long enough <WH7227> in this mount <WH2022>:

Turn <WH6437> <WH8798> you, and take your journey <WH5265> <WH8798>, and go <WH935> <WH8798> to the mount <WH2022> of the Amorites <WH567>, and unto all the places nigh <WH7934> thereunto, in the plain <WH6160>, in the hills <WH2022>, and in the vale <WH8219>, and in the south <WH5045>, and by the sea <WH3220> side <WH2348>, to the land <WH776> of the Kanahanites <WH3669>, and unto Lebanon <WH3844>, unto the great <WH1419> river <WH5104>, the river <WH5104> Euphrates <WH6578>.

Behold <WH7200> <WH8798>, I have set <WH5414> <WH8804> the land <WH776> before <WH6440> you: go <WH935> <WH8798> in and possess <WH3423> <WH8798> the land <WH776> which the YY <WH3068> sware <WH7650> <WH8738> unto your fathers <WH1>, Avraham <WH85>, Yitz'chak <WH3327>, and Ya`akov <WH3290>, to give <WH5414> <WH8800> unto them and to their seed <WH2233> after <WH310> them.
And I spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto you at that time <WH6256>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, I am not able <WH3201> <WH8799> to bear <WH5375> <WH8800> you myself alone <WH905>:
The YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430> hath multiplied <WH7235> <WH8689> you, and, behold, ye are this day <WH3117> as the stars <WH3556> of heaven <WH8064> for multitude <WH7230>.

(The YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of your fathers <WH1> make you a thousand <WH505> times <WH6471> so many more as <WH3254> <WH8686> ye are, and bless <WH1288> <WH8762> you, as he hath promised <WH1696> <WH8765> you!)
How <WH349> can I myself alone bear <WH5375> <WH8799> your cumbrance <WH2960>, and your burden <WH4853>, and your strife <WH7379> ?

Take <WH3051> <WH8798> you wise <WH2450> men <WH582>, and understanding <WH995> <WH8737>, and known <WH3045> <WH8803> among your tribes <WH7626>, and I will make <WH7760> <WH8799> them rulers <WH7218> over you.
And ye answered <WH6030> <WH8799> me, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, The thing <WH1697> which thou hast spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> is good <WH2896> for us to do <WH6213> <WH8800>.

So I took <WH3947> <WH8799> the chief <WH7218> of your tribes <WH7626>, wise <WH2450> men <WH582>, and known <WH3045> <WH8803>, and made <WH5414> <WH8799> them heads <WH7218> over you, captains <WH8269> over thousands <WH505>, and captains <WH8269> over hundreds <WH3967>, and captains <WH8269> over fifties <WH2572>, and captains <WH8269> over tens <WH6235>, and officers <WH7860> <WH8802> among your tribes <WH7626>.

And I charged <WH6680> <WH8762> your judges <WH8199> <WH8802> at that time <WH6256>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Hear <WH8085> <WH8800> the causes between your brethren <WH251>, and judge <WH8199> <WH8804> righteously <WH6664> between every man <WH376> and his brother <WH251>, and the stranger <WH1616> that is with him.

Ye shall not respect <WH5234> <WH8686> persons <WH6440> in judgment <WH4941>; but ye shall hear <WH8085> <WH8799> the small <WH6996> as well as the great <WH1419>; ye shall not be afraid <WH1481> <WH8799> of the face <WH6440> of man <WH376>; for the judgment <WH4941> is 'Elohim's <WH430>: and the cause <WH1697> that is too hard <WH7185> <WH8799> for you, bring <WH7126> <WH8686> it unto me, and I will hear <WH8085> <WH8804> it.
And I commanded <WH6680> <WH8762> you at that time <WH6256> all the things <WH1697> which ye should do <WH6213> <WH8799>.

And when we departed <WH5265> <WH8799> from Horev <WH2722>, we went through <WH3212> <WH8799> all that great <WH1419> and terrible <WH3372> <WH8737> wilderness <WH4057>, which ye saw <WH7200> <WH8804> by the way <WH1870> of the mountain <WH2022> of the Amorites <WH567>, as the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> us; and we came <WH935> <WH8799> to Kadeshbarnea <WH6947>.
And I said <WH559> <WH8799> unto you, Ye are come <WH935> <WH8804> unto the mountain <WH2022> of the Amorites <WH567>, which the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430> doth give <WH5414> <WH8802> unto us.

Behold <WH7200> <WH8798>, the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> hath set <WH5414> <WH8804> the land <WH776> before <WH6440> thee: go up <WH5927> <WH8798> and possess <WH3423> <WH8798> it, as the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of thy fathers <WH1> hath said <WH1696> <WH8765> unto thee; fear <WH3372> <WH8799> not, neither be discouraged <WH2865> <WH8735>.

And ye came near <WH7126> <WH8799> unto me every one of you, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, We will send <WH7971> <WH8799> men <WH582> before <WH6440> us, and they shall search us out <WH2658> <WH8799> the land <WH776>, and bring <WH7725> us word <WH1697> again <WH7725> <WH8686> by what way <WH1870> we must go up <WH5927> <WH8799>, and into what cities <WH5892> we shall come <WH935> <WH8799>.
And the saying <WH1697> pleased me well <WH3190> <WH8799> <WH5869>: and I took <WH3947> <WH8799> twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> men <WH582> of you, one <WH259> of a tribe <WH376> <WH7626>:

And they turned <WH6437> <WH8799> and went up <WH5927> <WH8799> into the mountain <WH2022>, and came <WH935> <WH8799> unto the valley <WH5158> of Eshcol <WH812>, and searched it out <WH7270> <WH8762>.

And they took <WH3947> <WH8799> of the fruit <WH6529> of the land <WH776> in their hands <WH3027>, and brought it down <WH3381> <WH8686> unto us, and brought <WH7725> us word <WH1697> again <WH7725> <WH8686>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, It is a good <WH2896> land <WH776> which the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430> doth give <WH5414> <WH8802> us.
Notwithstanding ye would <WH14> <WH8804> not go up <WH5927> <WH8800>, but rebelled <WH4784> <WH8686> against the Mitzvah <WH6310> of the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>:

And ye murmured <WH7279> <WH8735> in your tents <WH168>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Because the YY <WH3068> hated <WH8135> us, he hath brought us forth <WH3318> <WH8689> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, to deliver <WH5414> <WH8800> us into the hand <WH3027> of the Amorites <WH567>, to destroy <WH8045> <WH8687> us.

Whither shall we go up <WH5927> <WH8802>? our brethren <WH251> have discouraged <WH4549> <WH8689> our heart <WH3824>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, The people <WH5971> is greater <WH1419> and taller <WH7311> <WH8802> than we; the cities <WH5892> are great <WH1419> and walled up <WH1219> <WH8803> to heaven <WH8064>; and moreover we have seen <WH7200> <WH8804> the sons <WH1121> of the Anakims <WH6062> there.
Then I said <WH559> <WH8799> unto you, Dread <WH6206> <WH8799> not, neither be afraid <WH3372> <WH8799> of them.

The YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430> which goeth <WH1980> <WH8802> before <WH6440> you, he shall fight <WH3898> <WH8735> for you, according to all that he did <WH6213> <WH8804> for you in Egypt <WH4714> before your eyes <WH5869>;

And in the wilderness <WH4057>, where thou hast seen <WH7200> <WH8804> how that the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> bare <WH5375> <WH8804> thee, as a man <WH376> doth bear <WH5375> <WH8799> his son <WH1121>, in all the way <WH1870> that ye went <WH1980> <WH8804>, until ye came <WH935> <WH8800> into this place <WH4725>.
Yet in this thing <WH1697> ye did not believe <WH539> <WH8688> the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>,

Who went <WH1980> <WH8802> in the way <WH1870> before <WH6440> you, to search you out <WH8446> <WH8800> a place <WH4725> to pitch your tents <WH2583> <WH8800> in, in fire <WH784> by night <WH3915>, to shew <WH7200> <WH8687> you by what way <WH1870> ye should go <WH3212> <WH8799>, and in a cloud <WH6051> by day <WH3119>.
And the YY <WH3068> heard <WH8085> <WH8799> the voice <WH6963> of your words <WH1697>, and was wroth <WH7107> <WH8799>, and sware <WH7650> <WH8735>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Surely there shall not one <WH376> of these men <WH582> of this evil <WH7451> generation <WH1755> see <WH7200> <WH8799> that good <WH2896> land <WH776>, which I sware <WH7650> <WH8738> to give <WH5414> <WH8800> unto your fathers <WH1>,

Save <WH2108> Kalev <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Y'funeh <WH3312>; he shall see <WH7200> <WH8799> it, and to him will I give <WH5414> <WH8799> the land <WH776> that <WH834> he hath trodden upon <WH1869> <WH8804>, and to his children <WH1121>, because he hath wholly <WH4390> <WH8765> followed <WH310> the YY <WH3068>.
Also the YY <WH3068> was angry <WH599> <WH8694> with me for your sakes <WH1558>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Thou also shalt not go <WH935> <WH8799> in thither <WH8033>.

But Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>, which standeth <WH5975> <WH8802> before <WH6440> thee, he shall go in <WH935> <WH8799> thither: encourage <WH2388> <WH8761> him: for he shall cause Yisra'EL <WH3478> to inherit <WH5157> <WH8686> it.

Moreover your little ones <WH2945>, which ye said <WH559> <WH8804> should be a prey <WH957>, and your children <WH1121>, which in that day <WH3117> had no knowledge <WH3045> <WH8804> between good <WH2896> and evil <WH7451>, they shall go in <WH935> <WH8799> thither, and unto them will I give <WH5414> <WH8799> it, and they shall possess <WH3423> <WH8799> it.
But as for you, turn <WH6437> <WH8798> you, and take your journey <WH5265> <WH8798> into the wilderness <WH4057> by the way <WH1870> of the Red <WH5488> sea <WH3220>.

Then ye answered <WH6030> <WH8799> and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, We have sinned <WH2398> <WH8804> against the YY <WH3068>, we will go up <WH5927> <WH8799> and fight <WH3898> <WH8738>, according to all that the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> us. And when ye had girded <WH2296> <WH8799> on every man <WH376> his weapons <WH3627> of war <WH4421>, ye were ready <WH1951> <WH8686> to go up <WH5927> <WH8800> into the hill <WH2022>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Say <WH559> <WH8798> unto them, Go not up <WH5927> <WH8799>, neither fight <WH3898> <WH8735>; for I am not among <WH7130> you; lest ye be smitten <WH5062> <WH8735> before <WH6440> your enemies <WH341> <WH8802>.

So I spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto you; and ye would not hear <WH8085> <WH8804>, but rebelled <WH4784> <WH8686> against the Mitzvah <WH6310> of the YY <WH3068>, and went <WH5927> presumptuously <WH2102> <WH8686> up <WH5927> <WH8799> into the hill <WH2022>.

And the Amorites <WH567>, which dwelt <WH3427> <WH8802> in that mountain <WH2022>, came out <WH3318> <WH8799> against <WH7125> <WH8800> you, and chased <WH7291> <WH8799> you, as bees <WH1682> do <WH6213> <WH8799>, and destroyed <WH3807> <WH8686> you in Seir <WH8165>, even unto Hormah <WH2767>.

And ye returned <WH7725> <WH8799> and wept <WH1058> <WH8799> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>; but the YY <WH3068> would not hearken <WH8085> <WH8804> to your voice <WH6963>, nor give ear <WH238> <WH8689> unto you.
So ye abode <WH3427> <WH8799> in Kadesh <WH6946> many <WH7227> days <WH3117>, according unto the days <WH3117> that ye abode <WH3427> <WH8804> there.
